text: My best friend pushed me into the pool.
keypoint: My best friend pushed me into the pool

text: This happened during my cousin's wedding reception, where everyone was dressed to impress.
keypoint: This happened at my cousin's fancy wedding reception

text: And the reason it happened, she spotted a bee hovering near my face, - this was at a fancy hotel garden - and she tried to save me from being stung.
keypoint: She pushed me to save me from a bee near my face

text: And my aunt had just handed me a glass of champagne, and I warned her to be careful.
keypoint: My aunt handed me champagne and I warned her

text: 'Course friends, y'know, they don't always think things through. So that's when she gave me a little shove, and I tumbled into the water.
keypoint: My friend acted impulsively and I fell in

text: When I resurfaced, gasping for air, she just started laughing, and she apologized profusely.
keypoint: I resurfaced, she laughed and apologized

text: And... my beautiful dress was ruined, and naturally, the first thing to do was to get out and dry off,
keypoint: My dress was ruined and I had to dry off

text: and my cousin just says, "Just about a few inches more," she says, "and you'd have landed on the cake."
keypoint: My cousin joked I almost landed on the cake
